title: Ranjan back at Presidential Commission
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The special presidential commission investigating the allegations against the Anti-Corruption Committee and its Secretariat held its sessions today as well.
Former parliamentarian Ranjan Ramanayake was escorted to the presidential commission probing political victimization by prison officers on Thursday (7).
The Criminal Investigation Department’s (CID) former director Shani Abeysekara and former navy Commander Ravindra Wijegunawardana also appeared at the commission on Thursday (7).
